Test Case: Card Game
Expected Result: Enemies die as soon as their health bar is goes to 0
Actual Result: Enemy did not die despite their health bar reaching 0. (Note: I was testing the boundaries of the health drain. I kept killing enemies each turn and ending it right away to see what would happen.)
Repeatable?: yes? It seems like it is tied to the health drain that I mentioned above, once killing all their minions back to back their health bar eventually fell to 0. However, the game didn't end.
Blocker?: Yes? Once you reach 0 health you can interact with all the cards and even the phase change button. However, you cant actually do anything; the timer doesn’t go down and you can't end turn. I needed to surrender or refresh tab in order to exit
